Introduction

Park Serim (세림), also known by the mononym Serim, is a South Korean singer under Starship Entertainment. He currently is the leader and rapper of the boy group "Cravity".

Park Serim was the final winner of YG Entertainment audition from ‘Bundang LJ Dance Academy School’ in 2017.

He debuted as the leader of CRAVITY on April 14, 2020 with the mini album "HIDEOUT : REMEMBER WHO WE ARE".
